import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Progress } from "@/components/ui/progress" const metrics = [ { label: "System Integrity", value: 85, color: "bg-primary" }, { label: "Fuel Level", value: 72, color: "bg-green-500" }, { label: "Oxygen Level", value: 94.4, color: "bg-cyan-500" }, ] export function SystemStatus() { return ( System Status {metrics.map((metric) => (
{metric.label} {metric.value}%
))} ) }
